verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Are we to <S%G1961>continue<s%> in <S%G266>sin<s%> that <S%G5485>grace<s%> might <S%G4121>increase<s%>?
May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! <S%G4459>How<s%> shall we <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> to <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> in it?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G50>know<s%> that <S%G3745>all<s%> of us <S%G3745>who<s%> have been <S%G907>baptized<s%> into <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> have been <S%G907>baptized<s%> into His <S%G2288>death<s%>?

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we have been <S%G4916>buried<s%> with Him <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G908>baptism<s%> into <S%G2288>death,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> we <S%G2532>too<s%> might <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G2538>newness<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> we have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G4854>united<s%> with [Him] in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of His <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G235>certainly<s%> we shall be <S%G2532>also<s%> [in the likeness] of His <S%G386>resurrection,<s%>

<S%G1097>knowing<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that our <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>self<s%> was <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with [Him,] that our <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> might be <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> with, that we should <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> be <S%G1398>slaves<s%> to <S%G266>sin;<s%>
for he who has <S%G599>died<s%> is <S%G1344>freed<s%> from <S%G266>sin.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we have <S%G599>died<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%> that we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4800>live<s%> with Him,

<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> having been <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> is <S%G3765>never<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G3765>again;<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> is <S%G2961>master<s%> <S%G2961>over<s%> Him.

For the death that He <S%G599>died,<s%> He <S%G599>died<s%> to <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G2178>all;<s%> but the <S%G2198>life<s%> that He <S%G2198>lives,<s%> He <S%G2198>lives<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to be <S%G3498>dead<s%> to <S%G266>sin,<s%> but <S%G2198>alive<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> do not let <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G936>reign<s%> in your <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> that you should <S%G5219>obey<s%> its <S%G1939>lusts,<s%>

and do not go on <S%G3936>presenting<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> of your body to <S%G266>sin<s%> [as] <S%G3696>instruments<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%> but <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> as those <S%G2198>alive<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and your <S%G3196>members<s%> [as] <S%G3696>instruments<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For <S%G266>sin<s%> shall not be <S%G2961>master<s%> <S%G2961>over<s%> you, for you are not <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> but <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Shall we <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we are not <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> but <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be!

Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3739>when<s%> you <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to <S%G3739>someone<s%> [as] <S%G1401>slaves<s%> for <S%G5218>obedience,<s%> you are <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of the one <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5219>obey,<s%> <S%G2273>either<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G5218>obedience<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>?

But <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God<s%> that though you were <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> you <S%G5219>became<s%> <S%G5219>obedient<s%> from the <S%G2588>heart<s%> to that <S%G5179>form<s%> of <S%G1322>teaching<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> you were <S%G3860>committed,<s%>
and having been <S%G1659>freed<s%> from <S%G266>sin,<s%> you <S%G1402>became<s%> <S%G1402>slaves<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

I am <S%G3004>speaking<s%> in <S%G442>human<s%> <S%G442>terms<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G769>weakness<s%> of your <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> For <S%G5618>just<s%> as you <S%G3936>presented<s%> your <S%G3196>members<s%> [as] <S%G1401>slaves<s%> to <S%G167>impurity<s%> and to <S%G458>lawlessness,<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in [further] <S%G458>lawlessness,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3936>present<s%> your <S%G3196>members<s%> [as] <S%G1401>slaves<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G38>sanctification.<s%>
For <S%G3753>when<s%> you were <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> you were <S%G1658>free<s%> in regard to <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2590>benefit<s%> were you <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2192>deriving<s%> from the things of <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%>? For the <S%G5056>outcome<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1565>things<s%> is <S%G2288>death.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> having been <S%G1659>freed<s%> from <S%G266>sin<s%> and <S%G1402>enslaved<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> you <S%G2192>derive<s%> your <S%G2590>benefit,<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G38>sanctification,<s%> and the <S%G5056>outcome,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For the <S%G3800>wages<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G2288>death,<s%> but the <S%G5486>free<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
